titleStmt.title: Reflections upon the new test, and the reply thereto with a letter of Sir Francis Walsingham's, concerning the penal laws made in the reign of Queen Elizabeth.
titleStmt.author: Walsingham, Francis, Sir, 1530?-1590. Letter to Monsieur Critoy.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
"Sir Fr. Walsingham's letter to Monsieur Critoy concerning the Queens proceedings against both papists and Puritans": p. 15-20.
